creator: j@jjb.cc
text:
Hi,

I think -l should be default on ab.

Many apps are dynamic and will show as having "failures" when they do not.

If a developer cares a lot about responses being identical, then they will want to look at etags or do their own hashing/diffing. Body length is a clumsy and imprecise way to achieve this.

Thanks for listening,
John
